collection:
This privacy policy is intended to
inform you about how we collect, use, disclose, and protect the information
you provide us when using our service.

Information Collection We reserve
the right to record data sent anonymously to the APIs at gpt.foxinodes.net for
statistical purposes.

Use of Information The information collected
is used solely for statistical purposes to improve the Cosmos Explorer
service.

No personal data is collected, and the data received and sent is used
anonymously.

By using Cosmos Explorer, you agree to
the collection and use of your information in accordance with this privacy
policy.
sharing:
This privacy policy is intended to
inform you about how we collect, use, disclose, and protect the information
you provide us when using our service.

Sharing of Information We do not share the collected data
with third parties.
